subject: Allocation of work amongst empanelled advertising agencies for release of display advertisements
text: C 7el4 <THf serro (987 WRart 3n vararaf T /Phone 01-11-25074100/25074200 AATT) T48 Fax:81-71-26093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 6 uaz7-10, GNat; 06 Rerh-110075 6-8 & 6, Secior-1O, Dwarka, New Delni-110075 NHAUPolicy Guidelines/Allocation %f work amongst empanelled advertising gencies for release of Display Advertisement/2017 No.4.22/2017 Dated the 14th November 2017 (Decision taken on Media File No.11041/35/18/MR) Sub: Ailocation of work amongst empanelled advertising agencies for release of Display Advertisements In partial modification of NHAI Policy Circular No.4.21/2017 dated 11.10.2017 it has been decided that the newly constituted Committee comprising of the following officers shall select 03 (three) best creatives and will rank the creative of the display advertisements as 1st and 3r best: (j) CGM of the concerned Division dealing with the subject Chairman 060 (GM concerned a5 Member if CGM is not posted/ available in the Division) (it) Shri Vishnu Darbari, CGM (HR/ Admn)-II/ Member Shri P. K Dutta, DGM (HR/ Admn)-IlI (jii) Shri $. K Chauhan, DGM (FAA) 4 4" Mernber 2 The rest of conditions Of the Policy Circular dated 11.10.2017 shall unchanged. remain This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. (A. K.
